having experienced slow service at this restaurant i strongly believe that the management should consider retraining their staff this was my third visit and i had hoped that the disappointing experiences from the first two visits were just an anomaly but now i realize that three strikes mean its time for me to find another place

hiltons old property has outdated and dirty rooms unkept grounds an ignorant and rude staff and a water park that attracts the wrong crowd the police have to remove drunken guests every night making it a place you should consider avoiding

i absolutely adore the place and the salon itself is incredibly adorable cieras haircut and color left me feeling like a brand new woman both in appearance and confidence i am certainly planning to revisit

definitely get the watermelon margarita

i placed an order for two different dishes but strangely enough both of them turned out to be exactly the same it was difficult for me to determine which dish was which because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i hadnt ordered that not only that but there also was no fried rice included which is commonly provided by panda express frankly speaking panda express is far better than this and that should tell you something
the location of this place is very convenient just around the corner from my apartment they also have competitive gas prices and an amazing walkin beer freezer
how can you manage to have a bar that fluctuates in terms of crowd size yet remain incapable of meeting your financial obligations it falls on me to come up with a resolution

at 430 pm a group of three arrived and took their seats they were amazed to see such a bustling atmosphere so early in the evening the service they received was exceptional i decided to order the shrimp tacos and they didnt disappoint the refried beans had a noticeable hint of ham bone flavor that added an interesting twist without a doubt ill be returning to this place in the future
you might want to pass on the inflated and unpalatable taco salad that seems more reasonably priced at 199 rather than 699

with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting

i have been satisfied with the quality of the pizza and service at this place and my experience with their delivery service has been consistently positive

three people showed up at precisely 430 pm and took their places and they were truly amazed by how lively the atmosphere was so early in the evening the quality of service provided at the establishment was outstanding being a lover of seafood i opted for the shrimp tacos which exceeded my expectations what really impressed me though were the refried beans they had a distinctive hint of ham bone flavor that left a lasting impression i can say with certainty that my next visit is already planned
i have found both the pizza and service to be great at this place and my experience with their delivery service has been consistently positive
many people highly recommend the bi bam bap due to its outstanding friendly service making it a fantastic choice

which is the topnotch pho spot in the east valley with incredible prices i absolutely adore their fresh spring rolls last time i indulged in a delicious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even ordered an extra serving of their delectable spring rolls — all for just 25 its definitely become my goto place
best bbq ever  go here and thank me later

the pizza might be from a chain but its surprisingly delicious they have an assortment of flavored crusts that are full of flavor and will leave you satisfied the howie bread resembles dominos breadsticks which may not be the greatest but the additional flavors greatly improve their taste and the best part is its cheap

before a hoop game at uw the location is fantastic however it gets busy pretty quickly theres a wide selection of beers available at the pub but the food is just average and doesnt stand out from what youd expect in a regular pub

at soupersalad you can enjoy a hearty meal of soup and salad for nearly 10 along with the choice of including a beverage the quality and selection of food make it a place worth returning to occasionally as its nearby and reasonably priced particularly suitable for kids who prefer water as their drink of choice nevertheless i hold the opinion that making patrons pay separately for a soda is somewhat unjustified
the waiters at this particular place are stuffy and snobbish the food is just okay and we have decided not to return opting to dine at joes crab shack would be a more enjoyable choice

the lamp i bought for 50 is of low quality and the switch broke after 5 months when i contacted them they informed me that returns are not accepted after 90 days however if you go to the store they will provide you with store credit instead

although the atmosphere is entertaining it is not as suitable for children compared to other nearby places the waitstaff is attractive but not overly friendly this venue is better suited for young adults in their twenties who are looking for a lively happy hour and latenight excitement however the quality of the food is just average

the bar i stopped by had an impressive selection of beers it was the kind of place that attracted a significant crowd even as early as 4pm on a friday whether you preferred sitting outdoors or indoors there were ample seats for everyone however navigating through the crowd could become difficult especially if you wanted to make your way to the bar perhaps come nighttime they introduced table service to mitigate this issue moreover the prices charged were fairly standard

i decided to give this place a try for the first time and much to my dismay as soon as i obtained my cup and poured my desired drink into it i made the shocking discovery of an ant happily floating inside although the restaurant seemed to maintain a satisfactory level of cleanliness encountering unwanted surprises in my meals or beverages is something i cannot tolerate nonetheless it should be noted that the food was freshly made and delivered promptly

i have visited this place multiple times and during one of my visits i encountered an extremely impolite female staff member if they are unable to provide excellent customer service its possible that they will remain as a barista indefinitely i suppose i wont be returning there in the future

if youre looking for accommodations at hiltons older property be aware that its rooms are outdated and unkempt the surrounding grounds are in poor condition the staff can be uninformed and impolite and the water park draws an unfavorable crowd to make matters worse the presence of drunken guests often leads to police involvement on the premises every night considering these factors it would be advisable to explore alternatives elsewhere

the hiltons older establishment is criticized for its outofdate and filthy rooms poorly maintained outdoor areas staff lacking knowledge and manners and a water park that tends to attract troublesome individuals this results in police intervention required nightly to handle intoxicated guests it would be wise to seek other options in your search

on my inaugural experience at this establishment i encountered an unfortunate incident where i found an ant in my drink after getting it and filling it up despite the overall cleanliness of the restaurant discovering foreign substances in my beverages or meals is something i simply cannot tolerate nevertheless the food was prepared using fresh ingredients and arrived promptly

what is there left to say about la banquise its a pretty iconic place in mtl easy argument for the best poutine in the city this is where i had my first poutine and have continued to eat here for many times theyre open late so this is a nice place to go after the bar and fill your belly
original phrase nice place we waited 20 minutes to get seats but the food was very good the staff were so friendly

this was my initial attempt at dining in this establishment and unfortunately i had the misfortune of discovering an ant in my beverage after i filled up my cup despite the overall cleanliness of the restaurant stumbling upon foreign objects in my food or drinks is highly unpleasant for me on a positive note though the food was freshly prepared and served within an acceptable timeframe

soupersalad offers a meal of soup and salad priced just under 10 dollars with the added bonus of including a drink i find the food and selection enjoyable which makes me likely to return from time to time because its conveniently located and reasonably priced particularly for children who prefer water however i believe that charging extra for soda is not justified

can you recommend a topnotch pho place in the east valley that offers fantastic prices i absolutely love their fresh spring rolls last time i enjoyed a delightful combination of seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and an extra serving of fresh spring rolls all for just 25 it has quickly become my goto spot
lightening fast arrival even faster lockout service no doubt ill use his service again

discover solid value at this hotel featuring spacious rooms a uncrowded casino and an impressive pool while it may not be located on the strip it is close by and offers easy parking great shows cleanliness and a friendly crowd overall if you dont wait too long to book this is a decent option

i decided to try two distinct dishes but i ended up receiving the exact same thing for both of them it was rather confusing because the flavors resembled sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt request that moreover there was no fried rice included which is normally present at panda express to be blunt panda express surpasses this experience by a large margin and that speaks volumes

its a pizza chain but surprisingly delicious they provide a wide range of crust flavors that truly satisfy your taste buds their howie bread closely resembles dominos breadsticks which may not be topnotch but the added flavors definitely enhance the overall experience plus its affordable

for a positively delightful experience dont hesitate to visit two for two indulge in their jackfruit poboy a mouthwatering vegetarian option that will leave you speechless their homemade ginger beer is a true marvel and if youre feeling adventurous ask for the dark and stormy—trust me its worth it
its best to steer clear of the expensive and tasteless taco salad that should be reasonably priced at 199 instead of a whopping 699

what a fantastic encounter at two for two you must try the jackfruit poboy—its an unbelievably delicious veggie alternative to pulled pork and their beverages are simply marvelous especially their homemade ginger beer dont miss out on the dark and stormy even though its not listed on the menu

what is the best pho restaurant in the east valley with affordable prices i am a huge fan of their fresh spring rolls during my last visit i ordered seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and an order of fresh spring rolls for only 25 this place has definitely become one of my favorites

if you are considering staying at hiltons older property it is important to note that the rooms are outdated and not properly cleaned the outdoor areas are neglected creating an uninviting atmosphere moreover the staff may lack adequate knowledge and display rudeness towards guests the water park draws a crowd associated with misconduct leading to nightly police involvement in removing drunken guests considering these drawbacks it would be wise to explore other options for accommodation

rude impersonal rude snooty keeping bar seats saved at 730 pm on a monday night uncool i wont be back you arent that cool ever only putting one star because i must awful only has business because of where they are located about all there is around

soupersalad provides the option to have soup and salad for an affordable price of around 10 dollars with the opportunity to include a refreshing drink the enjoyable food options and wideranging choices make it a place to consider returning to on occasion given its proximity and reasonable cost especially for kids who opt for water however i personally feel that an additional fee for a soda is unnecessary

a group of three individuals arrived at 430 in the afternoon chose their own seats and were pleasantly surprised by how bustling it was for such an early hour the service they received was exceptional i decided to try the shrimp tacos and found them delicious especially when paired with the flavorful refried beans that had a hint of ham bone taste without a doubt i will return again in the future

the waiters at this particular place are pretentious and unfriendly the quality of the food is just okay and we have decided not to return opting to dine at joes crab shack would provide a better dining experience

the quality of their product is terrible i spent 50 on a lamp and the switch broke just after 5 months they refuse to accept returns after 90 days but if you visit the store they offer store credit instead

having been to this establishment on several occasions i experienced the unpleasant demeanor of a particularly rude female employee if their capability in offering satisfactory customer service is limited to only being a barista then i reckon i will not revisit that place
the wait staff at this restaurant is pretentious and unfriendly the food is mediocre at best and we have no intention of coming back youd have a better dining experience at joes crab shack
the quality of the pizza and service here is impressive and my satisfaction with their delivery service has been consistently high

i decided to try two different entrees but strangely i got the exact same dish for both identifying which one was which became a challenging task as they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce despite not being what i specifically requested on top of that there was no fried rice included in the order which is typically provided at panda express to be honest panda express is significantly better than this and that speaks volumes

a trio of individuals made their way to the destination at 430 pm and settled into their seats it was rather surprising to see the place packed even during the early evening hours the service they experienced was topnotch leaving no room for complaints my personal order consisted of shrimp tacos which turned out to be quite pleasing to the palate the refried beans on the other hand carried a unique taste of ham bone flavor that added depth to every bite as a result i am more than willing to revisit the place in the near future
why is it that you can have a bar that ranges from somewhat busy to very busy but still cannot afford to pay your expenses making it my responsibility to come up with a solution
how is it possible to have a bar that ranges from somewhat busy to very busy yet struggle to pay your expenses i need to find a solution

despite eagerly anticipating the new pretzel burger with great hunger on a saturday evening my enthusiasm quickly waned as i was dismayed by a burnt bun and felt unjustifiably charged an exorbitant price
the bi bam bap receives high acclaim for its exceptional friendly service and is strongly endorsed

this was my first time trying out this particular venue and to my dismay upon receiving my cup and filling it with my chosen drink i came across an unwelcome visitor—an ant albeit the restaurant maintaining a satisfactory level of cleanliness stumbling upon any foreign objects in my consumables is highly undesirable for me nonetheless it is worth mentioning that the food was freshly made and delivered within a reasonable timeframe
called to order spring rolls to go and the butt head on the phone said that they were too busy to help you have forever lost my money jenni pho
conveniently situated near my apartment this place offers competitive gas prices and an impressive walkin freezer for beer

a party of three arrived at 430 pm and chose their own seats they were surprised by how lively it already was in the evening the service provided was great i ordered the shrimp tacos and found them delicious the refried beans had a distinct ham bone flavor that was quite enjoyable im definitely planning on coming back here

i received two separate orders but they were identical and i couldnt distinguish between them because they both tasted like sweet and sour sauce which was not what i had ordered and to make matters worse there was no fried rice which is a staple at panda express honestly panda express is superior in comparison and thats saying something
